name: European Cabin Crew Association
goal: European Cabin Crew Association (EurECCA): is made up of cabin crew unions from ten European countries, representing over 70% of organized cabin crew in Europe,  promoting aviation safety  as well as better living and working conditions
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Institutional affairs, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
EASA rule- making,
CEN/TC 436 Cabin Air Quality on Commercial Aircraft- Chemical Agents,
Aerotoxicity
Traffic Rights Agreements
Aviation Package
Aviation European strategy
Flight time limitation
Health and Safety
European for Fair Competition (E4FC)
Social agenda
